header.heroHeading: Bring the warmth of wood and moments of bliss to you.
heroDescription: Slip on a piece and feel its gentle comfort.
Handcrafted wooden accessories for everyday life.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.description:
People say “I am on cloud nine!!” when they feel ecstatic or blissful.
We created this brand so our pieces can bring that same feeling of cloud nine to you.

We craft and sell wooden rings, ear cuffs, bangles, and other accessories.
Each piece is lovingly handmade so it can deliver moments of pure joy.

We also take commissions for wooden panels, frames, and custom items.
Please feel free to reach out.

woods.title: WOOD MATERIALS
woods.headline: “The character of wood – explore its charm through photos and stories”
woods.description:
Maple, padauk, purpleheart…
Discover the signature woods we use at cloud9 woodwork through easy-to-browse cards.
Tap any wood to jump to its detail page.

featuredCatch.maple: — A gentle wood that balances clarity and warmth —
featuredCatch.padauk: — A blazing crimson wood full of passion —
featuredCatch.purpleheart: — Deep, beautiful purple that changes over time —
featuredCatch.sycamore: — Refined white wood with a quiet glow —
featuredCatch.wenge: — Dramatic dark wood woven with charcoal stripes —
